Perceptor


Perceptor transformed quikly to his Robot mode and he shot against Kaiser 8 
shots, after that he aimed towards Rodimus






>From: Rudra656@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>::Kaiser::
>        Grateful for the reprieve he takes in the situation.  He watches
>Rodimus's worried look as Nightlight takes cover.  He launches another ten
>shots at Perceptor while still on the run.  He stops near Rodimus Prime.
>"I'm thankful for your aid, Maximal but your comrade is in greater danger
>than I.  And when I defeat these Predacon scum I'm afraid you will be next 
>if
>you choose to stay."
